remarks: Two ways of expressing "less than or equal to the greatest lower bound."  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2011.)
statement:
clatglb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
clatglb.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
clatglb.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
clatleglb $p |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ X e. B /\ S C_ B ) -> ( X .<_ ( G ` S ) <-> A. y e. S X .<_ y ) ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B y $.
$d G y $.
$d K y $.
$d S y $.
$d X y $.
